DOC.brief_summary: This observational cohort study , conduct two exist large administrative health database US ( outside Vaccine Safety Datalink ) plan confirm safety profile regard lack association intussusception Rotarix within 60 day vaccination real life setting ( routine use ) US . This study also include monitor Kawasaki disease , convulsion , hospitalization due acute low respiratory tract infection all-cause death within 60-days vaccination . This study involve three cohort , one expose two control cohort : infant receive Rotarix ( Exposed cohort ) infant receive IPV vaccination ( Unexposed cohort A B ) . This combined prospective retrospective cohort study . Prospective component study identifies compare study outcome follow Rotarix IPV vaccination Exposed cohort Unexposed cohort A , respectively . Retrospective component study identifies compare study outcome follow IPV vaccination Unexposed cohort B .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study GSK Biologicals ' Rotavirus Vaccine ( Rotarix® ) Administered Children Aged < 1 Year United States
DOC.criteria: For Exposed cohort : Infants age less 1 year study entry . Infants enrol one two participate health insurance plan databases within 30 day birth . Have complete medical coverage pharmacy benefit . Received least one dose Rotarix 1 August 2008 . Infants receive Rotarix liquid formulation also eligible . For Unexposed cohort A : Infants age less 1 year study entry . Infants enrol one two participate health insurance plan databases within 30 day birth . Have complete medical coverage pharmacy benefit . Received least one dose IPV vaccine 1 August 2008 , without RotaTeq vaccination . Frequencymatched Rotarix cohort gender , age first vaccination ( ±1 week ) calendar quarter vaccination within year . For Unexposed cohort B : Infants enrol one two participate health insurance plan databases within 30 day birth . Had complete medical coverage pharmacy benefit . Received least one dose IPV vaccine . Vaccinated 1 January 2006 ( inclusive ) 31 July 2008 ( inclusive ) . Not receive dose rotavirus vaccination . Frequencymatched Rotarix cohort gender , age first vaccination ( ±1 week ) calendar quarter vaccination . For Exposed cohort : • Subject receive dose RotaTeq prior first Rotarix vaccine study period . For Unexposed cohort A : • Subject receive dose Rotarix prior first IPV vaccine study period . For Unexposed cohort B : • Subject receive dose rotavirus vaccine prior first IPV vaccine .
